assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nikkiso Co., Ltd. engages in industrial, aerospace, and medical businesses worldwide. The company operates through Industrial, Aerospace, and Medical Business segments. Its Industrial Business segment products include canned motor, reciprocating, cryogenic comprising submerged and centrifugal pumps, cryogenic heat exchangers, ultralow temperature process plants, ultralow temperature equipment package solutions, water-conditioning systems for power plants, and warm isostatic laminators, as well as metering and mining systems, and odorizing systems. The company Aerospace Business segments engages in developing the carbon fiber reinforced plastic (CFRP) cascades for commercial aircraft, as well as offers aircraft components, and engine and wings parts. The company's Medical Business segment is involved in the manufacturing, sales, and maintenance of products and medical supplies for hemodialysis; and provides renal replacement therapy and related products, microwave surgical instrument, and STG-55, as well as air purification devices and deep UV-LED sterilizers products. It also provides 3D sintering equipment, ceramic and metal powder, dryers. The company was formerly known as Nippon Kikai Keiso Kaisha Ltd. and changed its name to Nikkiso Co., Ltd. in November 1968. Nikkiso Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
